artist: Worcester Porcelain Works (a.k.a. Royal Worcester Porcelain Company)
title: Tea Cup and Saucer, from a Tea Service
description: cups porcelain, powder blue ground, exotic birds, butterfiles and insects; L97.297.9a-12a  lady bug inside, bottom center; .13a-16a  winged bug inside bottom center; .17a-20a  butterfly inside bottom center; saucers L97.297.9b-15b butterfly (viewed from side) at center; 16b-19b butterfly with wings open at center; 20b two winged bugs at center
creditline: Gift of Judy and Kenneth Dayton
